title: Energy conservation - proton in 100 N-per-C field

content.question: What is the kinetic energy of the proton when it reaches Point <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"> <mtext>B</mtext> </math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="8.0 times 10 to the negative 20 power joule" overflow="scroll"><mn>8.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>20</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace></mrow></msup><mtext>J</mtext></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="8.0 times 10 to the negative 20 power joule" overflow="scroll"><mn>8.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>20</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace></mrow></msup><mtext>J</mtext></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
